page.title: 11 WAR MEMORIAL
page.content: In the centre of the village in { {RAMSDEN HEATH }is a {WAR MEMORIAL} about 2.5mhigh. It is protected by a green fence which is about 0.5m high. This is in the triangle of grass which is near the {WHITE HORSE PUB. { }This is what it says:- To the glory of GOD and the honour of the men of{RAMSDEN BELLHOUSE}who gave their lives for king and country in the great war. 1914-1919. This monument is erected in proud and affectionate memory by their{GREAT} fellow parishioners.{THEIR NAME LIVETH {FOR EVER MORE.} These are some of the names :- {ADEY.J.C, ASTELL.N.E. AMOS.T, {DOBLE.L, GILBERT.D.T, VOYCE.J.H.C {SHEAD.G.L, HOLLIS.E.K,(}nurse{) I think it is not very nice that all of these people are not remembered in the way that they should be.
